channel.title: tinylog on Spring Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in tinylog on Spring Cloud

item.title: Spring Boot integration lightweight logging framework tinylog
item.description: tinylog (https://tinylog.org/v2/), like various other things that start with tiny, is a lightweight open source logging solution. It itself contains only two JAR files (one for the API and the other for the implementation) and does not have any external dependencies. The total size of the two JAR files is only 178KB. Although it is a lightweight level solution , but we commonly used the basic log management features are very complete , it has a similar API design with other popular logging framework , a variety of configurable log output options , performance is also very impressive (this is the official Benchmark (https://tinylog.
